(What is Slayer fireing at lunarpine? Lasers, bullets, give me something to
work with if you want a good fight.)

Lunarpine ducked his wolf head down so the shots would glance off his
shoulders. His momentum still carried him straight at Slayer. He quickly
transformed to bot mode attempting to tackle the opposition. His strategy
had to purposes. If he could tackle Slayer he would have an advantage and be
close enough where Slayer would be hit by friendly fire if the other
trainers attemped to step in.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 21, 2000 12:11 PM
Subject: Re: Destroying History


> ::Slayer/Ramulus/Proto/Smokescreen::
>
> Slayer nods as he recieves Prebon's orders, spinning around and firing a
few
> shots at Lunarpine as the bot jumps at him off of the tree.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus sees two missiles fly out of nowhere, followed by some chips. He
> swears.
>
> "Maximals, stay clear of the chips," he says, jumping when a huge rattle
> collapsing sound sounded near him. He spins around, his eyes widening when
he
> sees the Ark collapse in a clowd of dust. The dust clears, revealing
nothing
> more than a pile of metal, charred and bent. Ramulus looks at it in
horror,
> expecting to dissapear due to a time rip.
>
> But nothing happened. The forest and heap of metal and Ramulus remained
there
> as before, with no new feeling but a slight feel of relief in Ramulus. He
> exhales, realizing he had been holding his breath. Thank the Matrix Blue
> Stinger had taken the Autobots out of the Ark..
>
> He turns back to where he thought Tamtron was, firing a few shots at him.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing two missiles come out of nowhere, Proto aims his rifle, firing at
the
> place where the two missiles had emerged from.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Smokescreen jumps out of the way of a missile, the explosion sending him
> flying through a tree and falling onto the ground.
>
>
>
>
